title: Participatory Instructional Design for Improving Counterfeit Identification Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Project-based reinforcement of critical identification competencies through smartphone-based learning activities in a restricted technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can visually identify deciduous tooth morphology with an accuracy of 85% or higher.
Learners can compare and explain structural differences between deciduous and permanent teeth in three or more ways.
Learners can apply the importance of deciduous tooth management to three or more real-world cases in pediatric patient care.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
